item.description: This will be a fun night! Come join us after work for great conversation, delicious Chinese hors dâ€™oeuvres, and mingle with old and new friends! There is no charge. For info, call Gail at 860-582-8229. Sponsored by Singles Social Connections. Directions to 831 Farmington Avenue: I 84, Exit 42 Park Road, turn right then left onto Trout Brook Drive, right onto Farmington Avenue.
